divs: Sighting Detailswell, all i can say is i was looking out of my window, it was a nice day, blue sky, with clouds here and there. my wife and i both saw this unmarked white flying disc fly over the building!. it seems as though ohio is a hotbed of activity. there is nothing to explain, really, except that it was unmarked, and white, and traveled quite fast.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Niles
There were no other sightings in Niles on or around December 15th 2012
